title.en: fromThe Secret Treasury of Ultimate Reality Ḍākinīs

text.en: Mother of the unborn ultimate sphere, Great Bliss Samantabhadrī,
text.en-trans: kyemé ying yum dechen kunzang mo

text.en: Magical display of compassion, Great Bliss Victress,
I pray, hold me with the hook of your compassion!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so tukjé chakkyü zung

text.en: I offer you my body, possessions, and everything in existence!
text.en-trans: lü dang longchö nangsi chöpa bul

text.en: Bestow insight and courageous intelligence upon me!
text.en-trans: sherab zung dang lodrö pobpa tsol

text.en: Please care for me with great understanding and love,
text.en-trans: khyen dang tsewa chenpö jezung né

text.en: Dispel the pitch-black darkness of ignorance,
text.en-trans: marik münpé makrum sel né kyang

text.en: And bless me with flourishing intelligence and insight!
